articles.description:
When you first step into the Terminus map, you'll likely stumble across the Armory room. But, once you head inside, the lockers specify an Armory Key requirement. Here's how to find Armory Keys in the Black Ops 6 Zombies Terminus map.


Where to find Armory Keys in Black Ops 6 Zombies Terminus map


You can defeat Manglers and Amalgam mini-bosses to drop the Armory Key in BO6 Zombies. They tend to spawn during the higher rounds, possibly around Round 11. You can Pack-a-Punch your weapon or utilize a higher rarity type to help bring down these foes quickly. They may drop a Loot Key (the Armory Key) with a specific color if you're successful.


Screenshot by Destructoid


The colors correspond to the rarity type of its specific rewards. So, if it's green, you'll get gifts that involve the Uncommon rarity. For the best of the best, be on the lookout for the purple or gold-colored ones, as these items offer high-valued equipment (just keep killing those Elite zombies).


Once you've acquired the Loot Key, go to the Armory at the F4 coordinates. You've likely encountered it when you first spawned in near the top-right corner of the map.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Unlike the Bank Vault in Liberty Falls, you don't need a special combination to open the Armory. Once inside, a timer will commence, giving you less than a minute to loot. Zombies won't get you from here, allowing you to explore the Armory safely. In return, you can open any lockers with the key to gain rewards. Items inside will always be randomized, whether it be a weapon with high rarity or a Monkey Bomb.


As you progress further in the rounds, you'll discover more Armory Keys in Black Ops 6 Zombies. The Armory also serves as a reliable safe haven for the later stages. Use it wisely to temporarily escape the relentless onslaught of zombies, regroup, and prepare for the next wave. Then, you can Exfil whenever you're ready to call it quits. 

The post How to get Armory Key in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Zombies Terminus (BO6) appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get Armory Key in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Zombies Terminus (BO6)

articles.author: Aleksa Stojkovic
articles.description:
Even though it's a thrash item, the Log is one of the most sought-after things in Fisch. There are even some high-level players who are still hunting for one to complete their bestiary. So, to help you all Log-missing anglers out there, here is our guide on how to catch a Log in Fisch Roblox.


How to Get a Log in Fisch Roblox



Screenshot by Destructoid



The Log, unlike other thrash items in Fisch, can't be caught using a Crab Cage. So, you'll have to fish for it, and for that, the Roslit Bay coral reef area seems the best. Here is the whole setup you should use and the best spots:



Locations: (1580, 135, 600) and (1640, 140, 440)


Rod: Rapid Rod


Bait: Rapid Catcher


Strategy: Toss the line, and the minigame will start instantly. If you can see a Log in the water, complete the mi…
articles.title: How to Catch a Log in Fisch Roblox

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
The Liberty Falls map in Black Ops 6 Zombies is rich with secrets, and one of the most intriguing is the locked Bank Vault. Opening this vault is a crucial step in embarking on the mode's standard Easter Egg-like adventure.


Here's a guide on how to unlock the Liberty Falls Bank Vault in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Zombies.


Table of contents

Before we dive into how to open the Bank Vault, we'll explain how to find it first. The Liberty Falls Bank Fault is found at the F4 coordinates inside the Ice Cream shop. It'll also be ne…
articles.title: How to open Liberty Falls Bank Vault in Black Ops 6 Zombies (BO6)

articles.author: Annie Thelen
articles.description:
As The Sims 4 goes on, it seems like more dishes for your Sims to cook up are added all the time. Delicious desserts, yummy soups, and more are at your disposal to keep your Sims fed and happy.


One dish, though, is special. Not only does it look delicious, but this meal can bring any deceased Sim back to life. If you need help making it, we’re here to show you all the ingredients to whip it up.


All ingredients needed for Ambrosia in Sims 4


Screenshot by Destructoid


You’ll need three different ingredients to make Ambrosia, as well as being level ten in both the cooking and gourmet cooking skills:



Death Flower


Potion of Youth 


Angelfish



Once you have all three and have reached the maximum skill levels for both cooking and gourmet cooking, you can go to any fridge or stove a…
articles.title: How to make Ambrosia in The Sims 4

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
If you're still looking to improve your collection and get more resources in Dragon Ball Sparking Zero, the Shenron summonings can be highly beneficial.


Shenron is one of the different summoning types available in the game. To summon him, you'll need to gather seven Dragon Balls. You can choose between five different types of wishes, but not all of them are the same. Here's my ranking of the five different summons, from least to most helpful.


All Shenron summonings ranked in Dragon Ball Sparking Zero


Do note that this ranking is based on personal preferences, and the order will change based on your current collection and factors like how much Zeni you might already have.


Image via Bandai Namco


5. I Want More Titles


Sure, you can get some exclusive titles by wishing to Shenron, …
articles.title: Dragon Ball Sparking Zero: All Shenron summonings ranked

articles.author: Randy Marr
articles.description:
It's been 20 years since the servers for World of Warcraft went live, caught fire, rebooted, and eventually started working. Now's our chance to revisit the last 20 years on Azeroth. There's plenty to do to collect fancy armor redesigns from the olden days, new toys, mounts, and plenty of pets.


The celebration takes place in Tanaris at the entrance to the Caverns of Time. You can use the portal in your faction's capital to get there quickly. You'll find many fun activities, quests, and vendors all over, so check it out!


What can you do during the 20th Anniversary Celebration in WoW?


Celebrating the history of World of Warcraft is no easy task. What do you focus on for 20 years of content? The answer is a little bit of everything! What's great about this event is that it isn't just qu…
articles.title: World of Warcraft 20th Anniversary Patch Guide

articles.author: Nebojsa Prijic
articles.description:
The Haunt is in full swing, so prepare to be jump-scared by the Headless Horsman and his unfriendly skeleton friends. During this year's Halloween event, you will be able to collect badges and achievements by dressing well, voting, and exploring. This The Haunt badges and achievements list will help you organize your Halloween quest.


Table of Contents
List of All Badges in The Haunt Halloween Event - Roblox
Daily Rewards Badges List

How to Get Cursed Items in The Haunt - Cursed Achievements
How to Get Smash Pumpkin Badges in The Haunt
How to Get All In-Hub Items & Badges in The Haunt


List of All Badges in The Haunt Halloween Event - Roblox


Image via Roblox


During The Haunt Halloween event, you'll be able to get plenty of badges (achievements), mainly by playing the Roblox games th…
articles.title: All The Haunt Badges & Achievements List – Halloween 2024

articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
In Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, playing the objective and performing exceptionally well comes with the ultimate reward: Scorestreaks. Although the concept is a familiar one in the franchise, Black Ops 6 introduces its own unique twists, so here’s a complete rundown of all the available Scorestreaks and what they bring to the battlefield.


Every Scorestreak in Black Ops 6


Black Ops 6's selection of Scorestreaks features a blend of old and new from the franchise, with some of the old offering a unique take on their core concept. Scorestreaks are obtained by accumulating Score, which represents how well you're playing in a match. Score is gained by completing objectives, supporting your team, and killing enemies.


Image via Activision


Scout Pulse 


Scout Pulse allows you to scan for near…
articles.title: All Scorestreaks in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6

articles.author: Andrew Heaton
articles.description:
There aren't many games that mix heavy-handed literature with first-person shooting. BioShock is one example that springs to mind. Not so much Half-Life 2, but someone is in the midst of creating a mod for Valve's iconic FPS that seems to take cues from the classics.


ModDB user GRÆMAMËTH is currently working on "Goethe's Last Laugh," a full-conversion modification for Half-Life 2 that, from the images alone, looks wonderfully bizarre. Oh, hell. I don't think I could do it justice, so here's what the creator has to say about the project (after you've checked out the footage below, of course):





In the abstract, it’s a working class power fantasy about addiction and revolution...


Take control of Jackson Ian Faust, a 300 year old, self destructive, misanthropic vampire, and investigate the many unusual phenomenon of Gondolas city, a fictional civilization set on the sinking monster island of Duciano.




No mention of a Mephistopheles-inspired gravity gun


It's still in development at the moment, with no release date yet. However, you can keep an eye on progress from the ModDB page linked above, or follow it on Itch.io. This one definitely seems too good to miss out on, especially with its proposed themes.


Now, I've never read Faust, so I can't say how certain this Half-Life 2 mod will match up with the original text. But I do know that it must have inspired the project, given that it's titled after the play's author, Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, and has you play as someone literally called Faust.


It's also where we get the term "Faustian" from, to refer to any kind of deal or barter that leads to dire consequences. I'm hoping there'll be some of that in GRÆMAMËTH's mod. If not, at least we get to play as a cynical vampire that's three centuries old. That's always dope. Do people say "dope" these days?

The post Bizarre Half-Life 2 mod lets you control a ‘300-year-old, self-destructive, misanthropic vampire’ appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Bizarre Half-Life 2 mod lets you control a ‘300-year-old, self-destructive, misanthropic vampire’

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
Writing guides for a living, you usually leave the menu on while you work on each article. However, for this instance with the Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero menus, I furiously turn off the game and go to the PS5 home screen.


That's because the Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero menus are so irritating that they spiral my brain out of focus. The most agonizing thing about these menus is that you'll hear the same voicelines over and over again, sometimes repeating straight after they've said them. You'll either hear the interviewer agonizingly asking questions to Tien and Android 17 over and over, or have Goku ask Dende what he's up to. Hercule is also a pain as he constantly gets spooked by Goku appearing at his house by instant transmission.


Screenshot by Destructoid


The odd thing about the Dra…
articles.title: Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero may have the most annoying menus ever

articles.author: Aleksa Stojkovic
articles.description:
The Haunt has started on Roblox, and to participate in it, you'll have to take photos of the coolest, spookiest, and also cutest things you find in The Haunt-affected games. Naturally, dressing up and capturing a photo of your avatar is also an option. To learn what you can win in the contest, scroll down to our complete list of all rewards for The Haunt Roblox event.


All Voting Rewards in The Haunt


Below is the list of all rewards you'll earn as you take part in the voting during The Haunt. Each day, there will be a different category you'll need to vote on. Note that you have to vote at least 5 times to earn the reward for that day. You can continue voting, but five times will get you one Halloween event reward for each category. Voting is done using iron maiden torture devices locat…
articles.title: Complete Roblox The Haunt Rewards List – All Halloween Items

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
It’s cursed. Food truck games are cursed. I just want a good food truck game, but this keeps happening. Despite being someone who encourages people to play less-than-spectacular games, I haven’t been able to finish a food truck game.


This goes back to Food Truck Simulator in 2022. I was quite excited about that game, but when it arrived, it was full of bugs and design issues that caused me to drop it midway through the game. Fruitbus is essentially a repeat of that. Every time I sat down to play it, either a bug or just an annoying design decision would cause me to walk away until I just decided enough was enough. It breaks my heart, but I didn’t finish Fruitbus.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Fruitbus (PC)
Developer: Krillbite Studios
Publisher: Krillbite Studios
Released: October 28, 20…
articles.title: Review: Fruitbus

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
With almost no legal access to popular Western movies, Russian cinemas have been selling tickets to short local movies to disguise the unlicensed screening of major Hollywood movies shown during the same sitting. Depending on the direction of the wind, Moscow turns a blind eye or warns of a crackdown on pre-screening piracy, including one expected anytime now. In parallel, legal streaming platforms are enjoying huge growth as business booms.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Warning For Russian Cinemas as Legal Streaming Revenues Skyrocket

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
A copyright lawsuit between popular adult site nHentai and the Californian company PCR Distributing has taken an interesting turn. Nhentai requested a protective order, in which it argues that PCR granted written permission to use its content. The rightsholder also contemplated running ads on the site, nHentai says.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: nHentai Fights Back in Piracy Lawsuit: ‘Rightsholder Gave Permission’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Authorities in New Zealand recently confirmed that Kim Dotcom will be extradited to the United States to face a criminal prosecution in connection with Megaupload, the file-hosting site he founded. In the United States, the 500 companies and 300,000 members of anti-piracy coalition CreativeFuture, are celebrating already. The extradition "of one of the internet era’s leading jackasses" takes place through the medium of an interactive quiz.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: CreativeFuture Celebrates Kim Dotcom’s Extradition Via Interactive Quiz

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cox Communications is fighting a writ of certiorari filed by several record labels at the U.S. Supreme Court. The music companies argue that ISPs can be held vicariously liable for pirating subscribers, even when they don't directly profit from this activity. Cox argues that this "radical new theory" would make ISPs liable for virtually anything their users do online.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox Asks Supreme Court to Reject Record Labels’ Petition over ISPs ‘Piracy Profits’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Seattle Seahawks cornerback Tariq Woolen, who reportedly earns over $1 million a year, used pirate streaming site MethStreams to watch his own team play. This revelation came from Woolen's Instagram story, where he shared an image clearly displaying the site's URL. While Woolen seemed unconcerned when the news reached him, the NFL, which actively combats piracy, will likely take a different view.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: NFL Player Uses Pirate Streaming Site to Watch His Own Team

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After Italy's Piracy Shield system blocked Google Drive last weekend, telecoms regulator AGCOM says that if Google had fully collaborated in the fight against piracy, the disruption could've been easily avoided. Meanwhile, an expert has raised the alarm over Piracy Shield's security, warning that nobody knows whether a bad actor has infiltrated the platform. Google Drive today, but will it be trains, hospitals, and government infrastructure tomorrow?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Victim Blamed For Piracy Shield Blunder, Warning Over Infiltration Risk

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Polish streaming service CDA has once again been accused of being a notorious piracy market by the Motion Picture Association (MPA). CDA sent a rebuttal to the US government, dismissing the claims as false and misleading. In addition, the company points out that the MPA was provided with a direct takedown tool but has never used it.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: MPA’s Piracy Claims are ‘False’ and ‘Misleading’, Streaming Platform Says

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Alien: Romulus' tops the chart, followed by 'Deadpool & Wolverine'. 'The Wild Robot' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 10/21/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After blocking Cloudflare to prevent IPTV piracy just a few months ago, on Saturday the rightsholders behind Piracy Shield ordered Italy's ISPs to block Google Drive. The subsequent nationwide blackout, affecting millions of Italians, wasn't just a hapless IP address blunder. This was the reckless blocking of a Google.com subdomain that many 10-year-olds could identify as being important. Reckless people and internet infrastructure, what could possibly go wrong next?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Drive Blackout in Italy After Another Major Anti-Piracy Blunder

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The ESA, which represents several major gaming companies, has shared an updated list of notorious piracy threats with the U.S. Government. One of the notable newcomers is FitGirl-Repacks, which has been a dominant player in the game piracy landscape for years. Meanwhile, ESA's report no longer mentions malware, cryptocurrencies, or Scene release groups, which were previously seen as 'growing trends'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Game Companies List ‘FitGirl-Repacks’ as a Key Piracy Threat

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Court of Rome has ordered Cloudflare to take action against one of its customers, pirate streaming site 'Guardaserie'. Cloudflare is required to disconnect the site and block related domain names, including those that are registered in the future. In addition, the company must share information that can help to identify the operator. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Orders Cloudflare to Block and Identify ‘Pirate Site’ Customer

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The Court of Justice of the European Union has handed a historic victory to Datel, the company behind video game cheat device Action Replay. For well over a decade, Sony argued that modification of game generated code amounted to copyright infringement. The CJEU judgment holds that there was no violation of Sony's rights, since Action Replay ran alongside Sony's game code, only modifying values in RAM while leaving object code untouched.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sony Loses as CJEU Rules Datel’s RAM Data ‘Cheat’ Non-Copyright Infringing

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy is suffering downtime again today. While the site no longer spooks its visitors with cryptic messages, the repeated issues are somewhat unusual. TorrentGalaxy reportedly changed owners, which could partly explain the recent troubles. This is another chapter in the unusual history of the site, which originated in the 1337x chatbox after ExtraTorrent shut down.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy Has a Rough Start Under New Owners

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
City of London Police say a man was arrested this week as part of an operation to disrupt the supply of pirate IPTV subscriptions in the UK. After targeting a residential address and four business addresses in the West Midlands, police say a 38-year-old man was detained on suspicion of copyright and money laundering offenses. Police also shared photos taken during the operation, a relative rarity these days but a welcome source of additional information nonetheless.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Server Shut Down as City of London Police Target UK ‘Bulk Seller’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A lawsuit filed at a Seattle court this week targets Ukraine-based hosting Provider Virtual Systems. Coordinated by the International Broadcaster Coalition Against Piracy (IBCAP), the lawsuit focuses on Virtual Systems' self-promotion as a 'DMCA-ignored' host. After allegedly ignoring over 500 DMCA-style infringement notices relating to dozens of pirate IPTV services, the lawsuit demands over $42m in copyright damages.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: IPTV Piracy Lawsuit Targets ‘DMCA Ignored’ Host in $42M Lawsuit

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Korean game publisher Nexon is using the U.S. legal system to address online copyright infringement. The company obtained a DMCA subpoena that requires Discord to hand over the personal details of suspected pirates. While Discord has shared information in the past, it doesn't plan to cooperate any longer, refusing to play the role of 'anti-piracy police'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Discord Disputes DMCA Subpoena, Rejects Role as ‘Anti-Piracy’ Partner

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After the world's largest streaming piracy network was shut down in Vietnam recently, sites like FMovies, 123Movies, and Soap2Day should in theory be a thing of the past. Yet as recent MPA blocking measures in the UK show, that's far from reality. Hundreds of domains with similar branding are scooping up millions of visitors, but who operates them and from where, is currently unknown.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: After Historic Win, MPA Battles Endless FMovies, Soap2Day & 123Movie Clones

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Two book authors are asking a U.S. federal court to enforce a $1.4 million piracy judgment against Cloudflare. A Moldovan court previously ruled that Cloudflare is liable as it failed to block access to a pirated book offered though one of its customers. The company has yet to pay these damages. The case can have broad implications, but it's uncertain if the U.S. court will indeed validate the Moldovan order.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Rightsholders Seek U.S. Help to Collect $1.4 Million Piracy Judgment Against Cloudflare

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After pleading guilty to several charges in connection with the sale of pirate IPTV subscriptions, last Friday a man and a woman were sentenced at a court in Northern Ireland. With estimated profits of £475,000, across four years of offending, the man was sentenced to two years' prison and a further two on license, the Federation Against Copyright Theft reports. Is that sentence too long, or not long enough? That could depend on relevant information that FACT isn't reporting.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Why a Pirate IPTV Seller’s 4-Year Prison Sentence Means Little Without Context

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (Kartik)
articles.description:
Unrest is a roleplaying game developed by Pyrodactyl Studios set in a fantasy interpretation of ancient India. You’ll step into the shoes of ordinary people and navigate a world fraught with challenges as they strive for safety, freedom, and peace.
We are proud to announce that Unrest is now playable using ScummVM thanks to the work done by our GSoC student, Kartik Agarwala! Help us test the game by grabbing a daily build of ScummVM. Read through our testing guidelines, and please take some screenshots along the way. If you encounter any issues, please report them to our bugtracker.
If you don’t own Unrest, you can purchase this game from either GOG or Steam. The demo for the game is also supported and available from our web site.
Now go, use your manipulative skills to bring peace to this troubled world where chaos is not afar. For the most daring players using the iron-man mode, saving and loading the game is only available using ScummVM's Global Main Menu.
>
articles.title: “Can you bring peace to.. UNREST?”

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (jibbodahibbo, Bosca)
articles.description:
Backyard Basketball, is finally ready to come off the bench for some sweet public testing! You can now play again on ScummVM this beloved Backyard Sports title (not to mention the last unsupported game on the SCUMM engine). Play with the Backyard Kids and even create five of your own! This game also features (now former) NBA and WNBA stars Kevin Garnett and Lisa Leslie!
Much like the other sports titles of this franchise, controls are point-and-click by default, with gamepad and keyboard options. Pick your favorite kids and play some 3 on 3 basketball. Don't forget your 110% Juice or Dunking Donut for a slamma jamma! Pass that ball in, listen to the live commentary from Sunny Day and Barry DeJay and shoot some jumpers on your way to a championship.
Are you ready to play? Dig up your good old CD and fire up the latest daily build!
>
articles.title: “What Time is it? GAME TIME HOO!”

for Updates on macOS). Otherwise, you can download it here.
For information on new features and changes in Android Studio Ladybug Feature Drop, see the Android Studio Preview release notes.

For details of bugs fixed in each previous release of Android Studio Ladybug Feature Drop, see
closed issues.
General fixes and features

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Mylně jsem se domníval, že jdu na film o problematice eutanázie. Ale místo toho Toltékové, astrální cestování, život po životě, reinkarnace a Jaroslav Dušek. Hodně podobné jako "Tajemství a smysl života", ale o něco méně WTF a výrazně kratší. Každopádně velmi fádní a nudné, pokud od začátku nevěříte tomu, co je vám cpáno. (Ilča 20 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Tajemství smrti - 30 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Zdaleka nelepší černobílé drama o íránských džudistkách v Gruzii, jaké jsem v životě viděl. (Ilča 90 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Tatami - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Film, ve kterém většinu času není vůbec jasné, jaká je zrovna motivace které postavy na plátně (např. jestli právě dělá vtip, nebo jestli se bojí o svůj život). To je jeho největší a soustavný problém, ale má i mnoho dalších, například arabské teroristy z "Návratu do budoucnosti" a pointu, spočívající v tom, že veřejnoprávní média vám non-stop lžou a vy jim to štastně žerete (což je pointa pravděpodobně nezamýšlená, protože film spoluprodukoval Český rozhlas). Je velmi smutné vidět dílo, na kterém pracovali lidi, o kterých víme, že jsou schopni vyprodukovat něco zajímavého, a výsledek dopadl takto strašlivě. (Ilča 10 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Výjimečný stav - 20 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Není to kvalitní film, ale je šílený a není nudný ani rutinní. Je to výpověď o tom, co si Coppola na stará kolena myslí o světě a o filmařině - a taková výpověď mě zajímá. Ale kdyby to přesně stejně natočil 25letý absolvent filmové akademie, měl bych z toho jen legraci a vysmíval bych se jeho neschopnosti. (Ilča 60%)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Megalopolis - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Kdybych teoreticky měl pěti- až osmileté dítě, hrozně bych chtěl, aby se mu tenhle film líbil. Kdyby mu bylo 10 nebo 12 let, už bych mu nepouštěl tohle, ale první Bayovy Transformers. Je to fajn, ale je to opravdu jen a pouze pro děti. A navíc, viděl jsem dabovanou verzi a rozhodně byla méně zábavná než tři minuty ukázek v původním znění, které jsem viděl taky. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Transformers Jedna [Transformers One] - 50 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Prvních 30 minut psychologická sci-fi, posledních 30 minut absurdní groteska. A z jednoho do druhého se to překlopí velmi nápaditě, promyšleně a zvolna. Představte si "Evil Dead 2" nebo "Braindead", ale pro současného diváka a s nějakou tou myšlenkou navíc. Všichni zúčastnění zaslouží pochvalu, protože  tento projekt velmi snadno mohl dopadnout hrozně. (Ilča 90 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Substance [The Substance] - 90 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Dnes pokec (s Jakubem Červinkou) o epické videohře, kterou byste si neměli nechat ujít, a jejíž jediným problémem je, že má příliš pomalý rozjezd. Tento podcast je výjimečně k dispozici také na YouTube.
articles.title: Videohra: Warframe - 100 % (Host: Jakub Červinka)

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Hodně mi to připomnělo "On se bojí" nebo filmy Charlieho Kaufmana. "Jiný člověk" je ale "tlumenější" a první půlhodinu vypadá skoro jako normální film, který možná není úplně podařeně natočený. Teprve pak to začne být opravdu divné a vyjde najevo, že to od počátku všechno byl sofistikovaný plán filmařů a že tím asi chtěli něco říct. (Ilča 70 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Jiný člověk [A Different Man] - 70 %
